text: Agar az onho ʙipursi: «Cj kase osmonhovu zaminro ofaridaast?» Xohand guft: «Xudoi jakto». Bigu: «Pas inhoero, ki ƣajri U meparasted, ci guna meʙined? Agar Xudoi jakto ʙixohad ʙa man rance ʙirasonad, ojo inho metavonand on rancro daf' kunand? Jo agar ʙixohad ʙa man rahmate ato kunad, metavonand on rahmatro az man ʙozdorand?» Bigu; «Xudo ʙaroi man ʙas ast. Tavakkalkunandagon ʙa U tavakkal mekunand»
